title: Nexus Blitz
body: I want to play Nexus Blitz but it never comes up, my rotating game mode is locked how do I unlock it?{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body:
It's not a feature individuals have to unlock, it's a matter of when the queues are up. They've reduced the frequency of the RGMs basically for quality control and to prevent burnout (player side and dev side).

As for Nexus Blitz specifically, a more polished version is currently up on PBE, so we'll likely see some live tests pretty soon :) 

It's also worth noting that Nexus Blitz isn't technically a RGM, it's an Alpha gamemode which if it works out, will eventually end up as something like ARAM or TT (though given OCE's population it may still have limited queue uptimes).
